nodes.text: The tass root was a kind of plant native to the planet of Ruusan. When powdered, mixed with the flowers from the scintil vine, and dampened it formed a highly corrosive paste. In 990 BBY, Darovit, a hermit living on Ruusan, used the paste to sabotage the construction of a monument being built in the Valley of the Jedi to honor the Jedi of the Army of Light who sacrificed their lives to destroy the Brotherhood of Darkness.
The tass root first appeared in the novel Darth Bane: Rule of Two, written by Drew Karpyshyn and published on December 26, 2007.
